pis_title: Heat Shield Coating – Product Information Sheet (PIS)

titles.title: ThermaCool, Heat-Blocking, Dust Resistant
titles.title2: Heat-resistant coating for roofs, tanks, and pipes.

product_overview: Heat-resistant coating for roofs, tanks, and pipes.
short_description: Reduces heat absorption and thermal degradation.
positioning: ThermaCool reflects heat and insulates surfaces like tanks, pipes, and exposed roofing.

features_benefits.benefit: Reflects sunlight to reduce surface temperature
Maintains clean surfaces in industrial settings
Flexible adhesion prevents peeling over time

recommended_use.intro: Designed for high-temperature and dust-prone surfaces.

application_system.label: Surface Prep
application_system.purpose: Clean surface of rust, dust, and contaminants

application_system.label: First Coat
application_system.purpose: Apply as base layer for reflective protection

application_system.label: Second Coat
application_system.purpose: Reapply after 3 hrs to achieve heat-resistant shield

recommended_substrates.description: Cement fibre roofing or exterior panels

surface_preparation: Remove rust, oil, and dust from surface
Ensure substrate is clean and dry
storage_safety: Keep away from direct heat or flame

safety_first_aid.General: Wear gloves and use in ventilated area

environmental_commitment: Water-based, low-VOC thermal shield that reduces energy consumption by lowering heat absorption.

usage.application: Thermal protection and dust resistance for industrial and outdoor surfaces

specs_summary.application_instructions: Apply with brush or spray in 2 coats. Clean surface before application.
specs_summary.preparation_instructions: Remove rust and mask edges before painting
